drinks.name: Classic Milk Tea
drinks.description: A delicious blend of black tea and creamy milk, sweetened to perfection.

drinks.name: Taro Milk Tea
drinks.description: A unique and flavorful drink made from taro root, mixed with milk and tea.

drinks.name: Matcha Milk Tea
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of matcha green tea, milk, and a touch of sweetness.

drinks.name: Brown Sugar Boba Milk
drinks.description: Rich and creamy milk with caramelized brown sugar and chewy tapioca pearls.
